text: Kazimierz Rymut (1935-2006) was a Polish linguist. His area of expertise was the etymology of towns and geographical feature ==References== *Short obituary in English *Kazimierz Rymut (1935 – 2006), Aleksandra Cieślikowa, Instytut Języka Polskiego PAN w Krakowie. Likely the same as (academic publication) Category:1935 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Linguists from Poland Category:Etymologists Category:20th-century linguists
title: Kazimierz Rymut
